item.title: Markdown Support for Tables
item.dc:creator: levko
item.description:
Currently we’re using markdown-js library, which has some dialect with tables support (but I don’t know what surprises may be there with other features). But since markdown-js no longer supported (according to its readme), maybe it makes sense to replace it with something else (e.g. markdown-it)
